statements: SELECT * FROM environmental_data;
SELECT data_id, location, temperature FROM environmental_data WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT temperature, location FROM environmental_data WHERE carbon_level < 0.5;
SELECT location, humidity, carbon_level FROM environmental_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM environmental_data WHERE carbon_level >= 0.7;
SELECT * FROM environmental_data WHERE temperature > 25.5 AND humidity < 60.0 ORDER BY data_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM environmental_data WHERE location = 'Room A' ORDER BY temperature ASC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, MAX(humidity) AS max_humidity FROM environmental_data WHERE carbon_level > 0.5;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS data_count FROM environmental_data GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY data_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM environmental_data WHERE humidity > 70.0;
SELECT * FROM Environmental_Data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT id, location, humidity FROM Environmental_Data WHERE humidity < 50;
SELECT location, temperature FROM Environmental_Data WHERE location = 'Garden';
SELECT * FROM Eco_Behaviors ORDER BY impact_rating DESC;
SELECT behavior_name, description FROM Eco_Behaviors WHERE impact_rating > 5;
SELECT id, location, temperature, humidity FROM Environmental_Data WHERE temperature < 25 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM Environmental_Data WHERE humidity > 50 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT behavior_name, description FROM Eco_Behaviors WHERE impact_rating >= 3 ORDER BY behavior_name
SELECT id, impact_rating FROM Eco_Behaviors WHERE impact_rating BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT * FROM Environmental_Data WHERE location='Forest'
SELECT * FROM environmental_data_table ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM environmental_data_table WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT timestamp, location FROM environmental_data_table WHERE humidity < 50
SELECT * FROM environmental_data_table WHERE location = 'Indoor'
SELECT id, timestamp FROM environmental_data_table
SELECT * FROM environmental_data_table ORDER BY timestamp DESC, temperature ASC, humidity DESC, location
SELECT id, timestamp FROM environmental_data_table WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM environmental_data_table WHERE location = 'Living Room' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT location, temperature FROM environmental_data_table WHERE humidity BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(humidity) AS min_humidity FROM environmental_data_table
SELECT * FROM environmental_data;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM environmental_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_description FROM behavior_data ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_data WHERE created_at < '2022-01-01';
SELECT simulation_name, start_time, end_time FROM simulation_data WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM environmental_data ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM environmental_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50;

SELECT ed.location, ud.username, bd.behavior_description FROM environmental_data ed JOIN user_data ud ON ed.id = ud.user_id JOIN behavior_data bd ON ed.id = bd.user_id WHERE bd.behavior_type = 'Active';
SELECT ed.location, ud.email FROM environmental_data ed JOIN user_data ud ON ed.id = ud.user_id WHERE ed.timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT ed.location, bd.behavior_type, sd.simulation_name FROM environmental_data ed JOIN behavior_data bd ON ed.id = bd.user_id JOIN simulation_data sd ON bd.user_id = sd.user_id;
SELECT * FROM environment_data ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT id, location, temperature FROM environment_data WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT simulation_id, user_id, behavior_score FROM simulation_data WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY behavior_score DESC;
SELECT id, log_message, timestamp FROM simulation_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM environment_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, location, temperature, humidity FROM environment_data WHERE id = 1001;
SELECT location, humidity FROM environment_data WHERE humidity < 60 AND temperature < 30 ORDER BY humidity ASC;
SELECT user_id, notifications_enabled FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 5000;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
